articles.title: German researchers develop 1st test for new virus from China
articles.description: German researchers said Thursday they have developed the first diagnostic test for a new virus that has emerged in central China
articles.content:

articles.title: The secret quest to save the last wild ‘dinosaur trees,’ once nearly extinct, from Australian fires
